hanzi-su-wiki:
響

Значения

Раздаваться, звучать, отзываться, сказываться; влиять; эхо

Мнемоника

Отзвуки 音 происходящего в столице слышны и в провинции 郷.

Варианты

响, 響
purpleculture_pinyin:
xiǎng
echo; sound; noise; to make a sound; to sound; to ring; loud; classifier for noises
эхо; звук; шум; издавать звук; Звучать; звонить; громко; классификатор шумов
rtega_mnemonic:
響響RS
响响		echo, sound, resound, ring, vibrate
  • rural place 鄉 where sounds 音 echo
  • ⓢ one's spoken words 口 face or turn 向 back to oneself: echo

Antonyms: 答應 提倡 同意 同義 鼓吹 接受 反對
Pictophonetic: 鄉 indicates the sound; 音 (sound) conveys the meaning.

heisig_chinese_memo: People's voices are like echoes of sounds from their countryside hometowns....you can always tell where they're from by how they talk.
heisig_constituent: echo, home town, cocoon, silver, city walls, sound, vase, stand up, sun, day, tongue wagging
koohiiStory1: People´s voices are like echoes of sounds from their hometowns....you can always tell where they´re from by how they talk.
koohiiStory2: My hometown is a ghost town, any sounds echoes and echoes.
jp_example_words:
反響(はんきょう): echo, reverberation, repercussion, reaction, influence
影響(えいきょう): influence, effect
響き(ひびき): echo, sound, reverberation, noise
響く(ひびく): to sound, echo, reverberate
WaniKani_Radicals: 幺, 艮, 阝, 音
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you poop on the roots of a building, the sound will echo all the way through the building, and each and every person in there will know what you did.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Hear the poop echo. You know what a poop usually sounds like, now imagine that sound again, but louder and with an echo. How could anyone not notice?
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The echo doesn't stop there, this building's roots extend throughout the entire city of きょうと. The echo reverberates and soon everyone in きょうと is listening, horrified, to your poop.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Welp. きょうと knows you pooped. That will echo through your memories for the rest of your life. I hope you're happy.
Ru_Radicals: 幺 (короткая нить), 邦 (родная страна), 日 (день), 立 (стоять), 艮 (северо-восток), 音 (звук)
Ru_trainchinese: xiǎng: (глаг/прил/сущ) заставлять звучать; звучать, издавать звук; шумный, громкий; шум; эхо
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the sound (音) of your hometown (郷) affects you
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: To get their orientation dolphins let out cute little noises from their mouths and listen to the echoes.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " tone " to " xiang " sound, the original meaning is echo. "Shuowen": "Sound also. Congyin, the voice of the hometown." "Yi‧Xi Cishang": "It is also like a ring when it is ordered." Kong Yingdashu: "A sound like a ring."

" Sound " can refer to sound in general. "Selected Works-Yang Xiong "Qin Meixin": "Sounds of the day, the flames of flames flew." Li Shan's note: "Flying, the sound of earthquakes.

" Sound " also describes a loud voice. Tang Liu Changqing "Journey to Central Hunan-Pumice": "The apes roar in the mountains, and the people in the empty river scream."

" Sound " also refers to (speaking) having influence or reputation. Jin Luyun "An Ode to Ancestor": "Su Yong is loud and vigorous for ever.

" Xiang " also refers to Song Su Shi's "Answer to the Elder Nanhua": "The layman said: "There is a sound in words." Hua said: "Lingshan must not forget the payment."
humanum_short_description_en: From " yin ", " xiang " sound, the original meaning is echo.
humanum_full_description:
從「音」，「鄉」聲，本義為回聲。《說文》：「聲也。从音，鄉聲。」 《易‧繫辭上》：「其受命也如響。」孔穎達疏：「如響之應聲也。」

　　「響」可泛指聲音。《文選‧揚雄〈劇秦美新〉》：「震聲日景，炎光飛響。」李善注：「飛響，震聲也。」

　　「響」也形容聲音洪亮。唐劉長卿〈湘中紀行‧浮石瀨〉：「眾嶺猿嘯重，空江人語響。」

　　「響」還指(說話)有影響或聲名遠揚。晉陸雲〈祖考頌〉：「肅雍碩響，萬載是振。」

　　「響」亦指宋蘇軾〈記南華長老答問〉：「居士曰：『言中有響。』華曰：『靈山囑付不得忘卻。』」

①聲音：響聲。響箭。響馬(舊稱在路上搶劫財物的強盜，因搶劫時先放響箭而得名)。音響(a。聲音，多就聲音所產生的效果說；b。泛稱收音、錄音、擴音等設備)。
②發出聲音：鐘響了。
③聲音高，聲音大：響亮。響徹雲霄(響聲直達高空，形容聲音十分嘹亮)。
④回聲：響應(yìng)。如響斯應(喻反應迅速)。
響應 [ xiǎng yìng ]: to respond to; answer; Classifiers: 个
響亮 [ xiǎng liàng ]: loud and clear; resounding

從「 音 」，「 鄉 」聲，本義為回聲。《說文》：「聲也。从音，鄉聲。」 《易‧繫辭上》：「其受命也如響。」孔穎達疏：「如響之應聲也。」 「 響 」可泛指聲音。《文選‧揚雄〈劇秦美新〉》：「震聲日景，炎光飛響。」李善注：「飛響，震聲也。」 「 響 」也形容聲音洪亮。唐劉長卿〈湘中紀行‧浮石瀨〉：「眾嶺猿嘯重，空江人語響。」 「 響 」還指(說話)有影響或聲名遠揚。晉陸雲〈祖考頌〉：「肅雍碩響，萬載是振。」 「 響 」亦指宋蘇軾〈記南華長老答問〉：「居士曰：『言中有響。』華曰：『靈山囑付不得忘卻。』」
From " tone" to " xiang" sound, the original meaning is echo. "Shuowen": "Sound also. Congyin, the voice of the hometown." "Yi‧Xi Cishang": "It is also like a ring when it is ordered." Kong Yingdashu: "A sound like a ring." " Sound" can refer to sound in general. "Selected Works-Yang Xiong "Qin Meixin": "Sounds of the day, the flames of flames flew." Li Shan's note: "Flying, the sound of earthquakes. " Sound" also describes a loud voice. Tang Liu Changqing "Journey to Central Hunan-Pumice": "The apes roar in the mountains, and the people in the empty river scream." " Sound" also refers to (speaking) having influence or reputation. Jin Luyun "An Ode to Ancestor": "Su Yong is loud and vigorous for ever. " Xiang" also refers to Song Su Shi's "Answer to the Elder Nanhua": "The layman said: "There is a sound in words." Hua said: "Lingshan must not forget the payment."

響字的基本解释

響
xiǎng
见“响”。

響字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiǎng］
［《廣韻》許兩切，上養，曉。］
亦作“1”。“薌2”的被通假字。“响1”的繁体字。
(1)回声。
(2)泛指声音。
(3)指开口答话。
(4)发出声音。
(5)谓使发出声音。
(6)形容声音洪亮。
(7)指（说话）有影响或声名远扬。
(8)犹音讯。
(9)犹遗音。
(10)方言。清楚。
(11)用同“嚮”。趋向；向着。参见“響慕”。
(12)量词。表示声音发出的次数。

響字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【音字部】　響； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1398第02
〔古文〕??【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?許兩切，音享。【說文】聲也。从音鄕聲。【註】徐鍇曰：聲之外曰響。響猶怳也，怳怳然浮也。實而精者曰聲，朴而浮者曰響。響之附聲，如影之著形。【玉篇】應聲也。【書·大禹謨】惟影響。　又方響，樂器。【杜陽雜編】太和九年，宮人沈阿翹進白玉方響。　【集韻】或作㗽。【韻會】又作鄕。通作嚮饗。

響字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
響字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
ring
xiǎng
See "Ring".
ring
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiǎng］
["Guangyun" Xu two cuts, upper raising, Xiao. ]
Also known as "1". "Xiang 2" has been passed falsely. "响1" in traditional characters.
(1) Echo.
(2) Refers to the sound in general.
(3) Refers to answering questions.
(4) Make a sound.
(5) That makes a sound.
(6) Describe loud and loud.
(7) Refers to (speaking) having influence or reputation.
(8) Still information.
(9) Still a legacy.
(10) Dialects. clear.
(11) Use the same "xiang". Tend towards See "Xiangmu".
(12) Quantifiers. Indicates the number of times the sound is made.
ring
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【Phonetic Word Department】　响; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1398 No. 02
[Ancient text]?? [Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Xu two cuts, enjoy the sound. 【Said Wen】Sound also. From the sound of the sound. [Note] Xu Kai said: "Beyond the sound, it sounds loud." The sound still sounds, and it suddenly floats. The real and refined said the sound, the simple and the floating said the sound. The sound of the sound is like the writing of the shadow. 【Jade articles】Respond to the sound. 【Book·Dayu Mo】Only influence.　 Fang Xiang, musical instrument. [Du Yang's Miscellaneous] In the 9th year of Taihe, the palace resident Shen Aqiao entered the white jade ring.　【Ji Yun】or Zuo 㗽. [Rhyme Club] It is also used as a 鄕. Lead to feast.
ring

Name meaning
Nothing.
xiǎng
вм. 响
Radicals: 幺, 艮, 阝, 音  (poop, root, building, sound)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you poop on the roots of a building, the sound will echo all the way through the building, and each and every person in there will know what you did.
Hear the poop echo. You know what a poop usually sounds like, now imagine that sound again, but louder and with an echo. How could anyone not notice?
Reading Mnemonic
The echo doesn't stop there, this building's roots extend throughout the entire city of きょうと. The echo reverberates and soon everyone in きょうと is listening, horrified, to your poop.
Welp. きょうと knows you pooped. That will echo through your memories for the rest of your life. I hope you're happy.
